about.title: About So Fluent
about.subtitle: Be Yourself in English. Prosper Globally.

founder.name: Heloisa
founder.title: Founder & Lead Instructor
founder.bio: With a passion for both fitness and language learning, Heloisa created So Fluent to help ambitious Brazilians transform their careers through science-backed English learning. Her innovative approach combines physical activity with language acquisition, making learning 20-40% more effective.
founder.representationDesc: As a school led by a Black woman, So Fluent values diversity and seeks to reflect this in our practices and materials, creating a space where all Brazilians can thrive.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: At So Fluent, we believe that learning English should be natural, engaging, and effective. Our science-backed approach combines fitness with language learning, helping ambitious Brazilians achieve fluency faster while staying healthy. We're not just teaching English - we're transforming careers and lives.

fitness.title: Fitness + Learning
fitness.text: Science-backed method that's 20-40% more effective than traditional learning.

global.title: Global Community
global.text: Join 300+ ambitious Brazilians transforming their careers together.

results.title: Proven Results
results.text: Real success stories from students who landed their dream jobs.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How does combining fitness and English learning work?
faq.a1: During live workout sessions, Heloisa teaches English vocabulary and phrases related to fitness movements, creating a natural learning environment that makes retention 20-40% more effective.
faq.q2: Do I need to be fit to join?
faq.a2: No! All fitness levels are welcome. Workouts are adaptable to your current fitness level.
faq.q3: What if I miss a live session?
faq.a3: All sessions are recorded and available in the workout library for you to access anytime.
faq.a4: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time with no penalties.

recorded.title: Recorded Courses
recorded.description: Asynchronous lessons can be accessed anytime and as many times as you need. All include subtitles and extra practice materials with answer keys, ensuring clarity and autonomy in studies.

live.title: Live Classes
live.description: Real-time practice is essential. Whether in dynamic groups or private classes, you exercise your skills, receive immediate feedback and maintain motivation to advance with confidence.

virtual.title: Virtual Classroom
virtual.description: Our platform organizes everything in one place ‚Äî materials, lessons, additional resources and gamified activities. Additionally, you interact with a community of students who share the same learning journey.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Why are prices different by region?
faq.a1: We adjust our prices to be fair and accessible in each market, considering local purchasing power and economic conditions.
faq.a2: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade at any time. Changes will be applied to your next billing cycle.
faq.a3: Yes! The Free plan offers full community access and 1 course. Academy offers 7 days free for new members.

esp.title: English for Specific Purposes
esp.subtitle: Specialized English courses for professionals. Learn the English you need for your specific field.

whatIsESP.title: What is ESP?
whatIsESP.description: English for Specific Purposes (ESP) is an English teaching approach focused on the specific needs of professionals in different fields. Instead of learning general English, you learn the vocabulary, structures and communication skills needed for your profession.
whatIsESP.benefit1Desc: Learn only what you need for your professional field.
whatIsESP.benefit2Desc: Use the English you learn directly in your work.
whatIsESP.benefit3Desc: See faster progress by focusing on your area.
whatIsESP.benefit4Desc: Courses tailored to the specific needs of your profession.

medical.title: Medical English
medical.description: English for healthcare professionals, doctors, nurses and medical students.

tech.title: Tech English
tech.description: English for software developers, engineers and tech professionals.

business.title: Business English
business.description: English for executives, managers and business professionals.

academic.title: Academic English
academic.description: English for students, researchers and academics.

legal.title: Legal English
legal.description: English for lawyers, paralegals and legal professionals.

science.title: Scientific English
science.description: English for scientists, researchers and lab professionals.

custom.title: Need a Custom Course?
custom.description: Didn't find a course for your field? Contact us and we'll create a personalized ESP course for you or your company.

criticalThinking.title: CRITICAL THINKING
criticalThinking.subtitle: We don't just teach English - we teach you to think critically about language, culture and power.

question.title: Question Assumptions
question.description: We challenge linguistic myths and fads. We don't accept "it's this way because it's always been this way". We question why and for whom something is relevant.

context.title: Contextualize Cultural Practices
context.description: We explain the historical and cultural context behind English language practices. We understand where the rules come from and for whom they were created.

power.title: Reflect on Power and Privilege
power.description: We recognize that language carries power and privilege. We discuss how English can be used for inclusion or exclusion, and how you can consciously decide how you want to use English.

sources.title: Compare Sources
sources.description: We encourage you to compare different sources, question linguistic authorities and form your own opinions based on evidence.

identity.title: Maintain Your Identity
identity.description: We believe that learning English doesn't mean losing your Brazilian identity. You can be fluent in English and still be completely yourself.

conscious.title: Conscious Decision
conscious.description: You consciously decide how you want to use English in your life and work. We don't impose standards - you choose what works for you.

whyMatters.title: Why Does This Matter?
whyMatters.description: Learning English without critical thinking can lead to loss of cultural identity and passive acceptance of norms that don't serve your interests. With critical thinking, you learn English while maintaining your Brazilian identity, questioning what doesn't make sense and consciously deciding how you want to use the language for your own goals.

criticalThinking.cta: Join a community that values critical thinking, cultural identity and conscious learning.
